description: I met JP through a friend of mine who plays on the same hockey team.He noticed JP's hot masculine body and was convinced I would enjoy having him on my website.My friend was right! JP is everything I was looking for in a model and more.He's the sweetest guy and he had no problem performing in front of my camera even though it was his first porn scene ever.After the shoot he told me he had so much fun that he would be really excited to come back for more.As he left, he told me he was really open-minded... Hmmmm
title: JP, Scene #01
